verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>, to bring to remembrance <S%H2142><s%>. O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, rebuke <S%H3198><s%> me not in thy wrath <S%H7110><s%>: neither chasten <S%H3256><s%> me in thy hot displeasure <S%H2534><s%>.
For thine arrows <S%H2671><s%> stick fast <S%H5181><s%> in me, and thy hand <S%H3027><s%> presseth me sore <S%H5181><s%>.

There is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of thine anger <S%H2195><s%>; neither is there any rest <S%H7965><s%> in my bones <S%H6106><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of my sin <S%H2403><s%>.
For mine iniquities <S%H5771><s%> are gone over <S%H5674><s%> mine head <S%H7218><s%>: as an heavy <S%H3515><s%> burden <S%H4853><s%> they are too heavy <S%H3513><s%> for me.
My wounds <S%H2250><s%> stink <S%H887><s%> and are corrupt <S%H4743><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of my foolishness <S%H200><s%>.
I am troubled <S%H5753><s%>; I am bowed down <S%H7817><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>; I go <S%H1980><s%> mourning <S%H6937><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long.
For my loins <S%H3689><s%> are filled <S%H4390><s%> with a loathsome <S%H7033><s%> disease: and there is no soundness <S%H4974><s%> in my flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
I am feeble <S%H6313><s%> and sore <S%H3966><s%> broken <S%H1794><s%>: I have roared <S%H7580><s%> by reason of the disquietness <S%H5100><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%>.
Lord <S%H136><s%>, all my desire <S%H8378><s%> is before thee; and my groaning <S%H585><s%> is not hid <S%H5641><s%> from thee.

My heart <S%H3820><s%> panteth <S%H5503><s%>, my strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H5800><s%> me: as for the light <S%H216><s%> of mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, it <S%H1992><s%> also is gone <S%H369><s%> from me.
My lovers <S%H157><s%> and my friends <S%H7453><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> aloof from <S%H5048><s%> my sore <S%H5061><s%>; and my kinsmen <S%H7138><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>.

They also that seek <S%H1245><s%> after my life <S%H5315><s%> lay snares <S%H5367><s%> for me: and they that seek <S%H1875><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> mischievous things <S%H1942><s%>, and imagine <S%H1897><s%> deceits <S%H4820><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long.
But I, as a deaf <S%H2795><s%> man, heard <S%H8085><s%> not; and I was as a dumb man <S%H483><s%> that openeth <S%H6605><s%> not his mouth <S%H6310><s%>.
Thus I was as a man <S%H376><s%> that heareth <S%H8085><s%> not, and in whose mouth <S%H6310><s%> are no reproofs <S%H8433><s%>.
For in thee, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, do I hope <S%H3176><s%>: thou wilt hear <S%H6030><s%>, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>.
For I said <S%H559><s%>, Hear me, lest otherwise they should rejoice <S%H8055><s%> over me: when my foot <S%H7272><s%> slippeth <S%H4131><s%>, they magnify <S%H1431><s%> themselves against me.
For I am ready <S%H3559><s%> to halt <S%H6761><s%>, and my sorrow <S%H4341><s%> is continually <S%H8548><s%> before me.
For I will declare <S%H5046><s%> mine iniquity <S%H5771><s%>; I will be sorry <S%H1672><s%> for my sin <S%H2403><s%>.
But mine enemies <S%H341><s%> are lively <S%H2416><s%>, and they are strong <S%H6105><s%>: and they that hate <S%H8130><s%> me wrongfully <S%H8267><s%> are multiplied <S%H7231><s%>.
They also that render <S%H7999><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%> are mine adversaries <S%H7853><s%>; because I follow <S%H7291><s%> the thing that good <S%H2896><s%> is.
Forsake <S%H5800><s%> me not, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>: O my God <S%H430><s%>, be not far <S%H7368><s%> from me.
Make haste <S%H2363><s%> to help <S%H5833><s%> me, O Lord <S%H136><s%> my salvation <S%H8668><s%>.
